description:
My place is close to Restaurants, bars, cafes, banks, shopping centers, copy & fax center & most important Public transportation.  The apartment has the coziness yet roomy and open feeling with high ceilings. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Each room can accommodate couples or singles or sharing a bed.  The rooms are beautifully decorate with a homey feel withTV and cable.  The other two rooms have full size futon sofas.  The kitchen is beautiful and very functional for the Chef in you.  Truly a Home away from home feel.

The guess will have access to all of the amenities.

Great neighborhood. There are bike rentals a block away.  There is also a wine/liquor store across the street.  And to maintain daily  exercise, there's a yoga studio a couple of doors down on the same block.

Public transportation is within walking distance.  And Manhattan is a 20 minute ride on the subway.

If you need to do laundry it's located downstairs great staff.  Check is at 3pm and check out is at 11:00am with a courtesy of 12:00pm.
name: Tompkins Apartment mins to Manhattn
review: Myra est une personne très accueillante et aidante. Nous avons eu la chance de la rencontrer à notre arrivée afin d'avoir des détails sur le quartier (métro, restaurants...). L'appartement était très propre et il y a avait tout ce dont nous avions besoin. À quelques blocs, il y a un grand supermarché pour faire ses courses ce qui est très apprécié. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à New York. Merci encore!
